title: Moved from pixel 3 to 5. Apps won't remove advertising as says not connected to playstore
content: Apps such as met office I had previously had on pixel3 with no advertising as I had paid.  Moved device  to pixel 5 and advertising is appearing.  I don't mind paying again if I have to but message says ' please make sure your device is setup with a  Google account and signed into playstore'.  Same with other apps.  I have cleared cache on Google and play store and reinstalled the apps.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
